  • Upgrade to Box Enterprise and get custom branding and many more business-friendly features. Click here, or just call 1-877-729-4269 to talk to our business team.

    Custom Branding

     

    Make your company brand visible whenever you share content with external partners and customers.

    • Customize the Box interface with company logos and color scheme
    • Add other information, such as a link to the company homepage

    To enable this you must upgrade to Box Enterprise.

    Call 1-877-729-4269 to talk to our business team.

  • Tip: Disabling external links will restrict access by shared link to invited collaborators only.

    Shared Links

    For content I own, allow collaborators to:
      • Folders and filesall_items
      • Folders onlyshared_folder_only
      • Files onlyshared_file_only
      • Nothing, restrict sharingnone
       
      • Open and Collaborators Onlyopen_access
      • Collaborators Onlyrestricted_access
       
      • Preview and download the shared itemsettings_shared_link_preview_download
      • Preview the shared item onlysettings_shared_link_preview

  • Tip: Box Accelerator is a global data transfer network that improves the speed of your uploads. If you’re having issues with uploads, try turning this off. If your uploads seem slow, you may have a problem with your network or firewall - please review troubleshooting steps.

  •  

    • Access to Your Account

      For technical support, you can grant Box access to your account for 5 calendar days. At the end of 5 days, access will automatically be revoked. You can manually revoke access at any time.

      To determine if you need to grant Box access to your account for support, call Box Support at 1-877-729-4269.

  • Tip: Box has integrated dozens of additional, third-party services from FedEx, Google, Autodesk, eFax and others, so you can seamlessly edit documents, tweak spreadsheets, digitally sign contracts and more within the Box environment.

    • Use content in more ways & more places

      Popular services for editing documents, signing contracts, printing and shipping with FedEx and more are built right into Box. You can also share files in other services like LinkedIn or access files on the go.

      View all these applications in our App Marketplace.

      Box puts leading business applications at your fingertips, like TextFlow for seamless document collaboration, eFax for sending files by fax and integrating content with Salesforce.com.

  • Applications Linked by Single Sign On

    Here is the list of all the trusted web or desktop applications from partners that are linked to your Box account with single sign on. You can remove any of those in order to reset the association that was made between your partner account and your Box account. This will allow you to link your partner account to another Box account.

    Partner User and widgets on partner platform
    reset account association

  • Ready to get started with Box Sync? Download your version now:

    • Windows
    • Mac OS X

    Need access to the Box Sync MSI installers?
    Download your version now:

    • MSI Installer for Windows 32 bit
    • MSI Installer for Windows 64 bit

    Box Sync

     
     
    1. Get Box Sync for Mac Download the latest version of Box Sync for Mac now to start syncing content between your desktop and your Box account.
    2. Drag and drop folders Drag folders on your computer into a folder called "My Box Files" to sync them with your Box account online.
    3. Mark folders to be synced Log in to your Box account in any web browser and right click on a folder to sync it with your desktop. A blue icon means it's synced

  • Tip: Access your documents and files from any mobile device. It's easy to use and requires no configuration.

    Mobile Access

     
    Box for iPhone and iPad:

    View updates and share files and folders with your contacts. Learn more.

     
    Box for Android:

    View, create, edit and share files. Upload content to Box. Learn more.

     
    Box for Windows 8:

    Edit, share and manage files on your Windows 8 device. Learn more.

     
    Box for Windows Phone:

    Browse, view, and share files easily from your phone. Learn more.

     
    Box for Blackberry:

    Access and share Box files from your BlackBerry. Learn more.

     
    m.app.box.com:

    It's Box, optimized for mobile browsers. No software to install.

You are not eligible for a partial refund
We apologize, but your account is not eligible for a refund. As per our terms of service, partial refunds can only be processed for yearly charges which have been made within the past 30 days. We do not provide refunds for monthly charges. Please note that subscriptions are paid in advance and are not refunded based on usage or date of sign up.

  • Cancel your Box Account

    • When you cancel your Box account, All of your files will be immediately deleted and not accessible. To completely remove your Box account, please click the confirmation link below. If you would like to keep your account, simply ignore this message, or select "Keep account."

        Preview Beta v1 | Give Feedback | Disable
        It appears that your firewall may be blocking Box or you are encountering an error.

        Please contact your IT administrator to configure your firewall to recognize all sub-domains of .box.com, .box.net, .boxcloud.com and .boxcdn.net. The ports used on these domains are 80 and 443.
        See our Firewall FAQ.

        If that does not resolve the issue, then please submit a support ticket at https://app.box.com/help.
